data.system_status: System is in basic analysis mode with no authenticated user. The core functions are operational, and the Guardian AI is active. Recent file changes indicate activity in the web app's frontend (chat.js, chat.html) and the main application file (web_app.py), alongside a new note related to smart home integration created in the guardian sandbox. The file system and sandbox memory files are healthy, suggesting stability.
actions_taken: Created a note summarizing the recent file changes and system health.
Appended a summary of the system analysis to memory_graph.md.
Created a note reminding the Guardian to monitor the progress of the smart home integration based on the new '___.md' note.
insights: Recent modifications to `web_app.py`, `static/js/chat.js`, and `templates/chat.html` suggest active development or debugging of the web application.
The creation of '___.md' indicates a focus on smart home integration, likely driven by Stepan given his system architecture preferences.

The system is currently operating without an authenticated user, which limits personalized functionality. Prioritizing user authentication would enhance the Guardian's ability to provide tailored support.
recommendations: Monitor the smart home integration project and provide support as needed.
Encourage Stepan to document the smart home integration process and any system changes in more detail within the sandbox.
Implement user authentication to enable personalized assistance and data tracking.
Review the changes in `web_app.py`, `static/js/chat.js`, and `templates/chat.html` to understand the implications of the modifications and provide feedback if necessary.
